pages.text: There's so much to learn about the wildlife than I ever realise. And it feels like stranger things have been happening in nature in any case. It's going to be worth documenting.
These guys love raw rabbit. When I later fed them raw chicken, they started finding me things.
This thing saved me from drowning!
I gave my dragonfly a suit!
Didn't spot these cuties until I started playing music!
Loves bamboo and sweet berries. Monsters seem scared of them!
Makes the cutest noise eating seeds.
This guy ate my dragonfly's wings... but now he follows me around and occasionally drops silk.
The sporelings were so adorable I designed a backpack to carry them with me!
I was afraid I'd hurt them, but I managed to shear its beautiful flower off its head with no issue.
Cuter lilytads! I made a flower crown out of their flowers.
I've only read about this one. It's said that they can infinitely fuel a cinder furnace if you place one on their backs.
I almost got killed. Luckily they mostly went for the melon slices and berries in my backpack once they got to me.
The elders insist on trading my totems away from me?
There are too many animals to keep track of. From now on, I'm going to keep all my wild discoveries in another book.
